typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CUSTOMER_ID as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		PHONE as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		{ADDRESS LINE 1} as string,
		{ADDRESS LINE 2} as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		ZIPCODE as string,
		{ADDRESS TYPE} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
